chunk:
Arcona Gentle Solution, Repair PM

Brand: ARCONA

Category: After Sun Product

Ingredients: Agua (Distilled Water), Hamamelis Virginiana Extract (Witch Hazel), Hydrolyzed Soy Extract, Glycerine, Glycolic Acid Polymer, Lactic Acid Polymer, Carrageenan (Chondrus Crispus) (Carrageenan), Prunus Armeniaca Kernel Oil (Apricot), Glycogen, Beta Fructan, Gl

en, Beta Fructan, Glucosamine HCl, Chlorophyll, Guava Extract (Psidium Guajava), Grapefruit Seed Extract (Citrus Grandis)

Directions: Use 2-4 times a week: Apply after cleansing to face, neck and decollete with upward and outward circular motions.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental
